lyrics:
You Keep Me Hanginâ€™ On Lyrics[Chorus]
Set me free, why don't cha, baby?
Get out my life, why don't cha, baby?
'Cause you don't really love me
You just keep me hangin' on
You don't really need me
But you keep me hangin' on

[Verse 1]
Why do you keep a-comin' around
Playin'-a with my heart?
Why don't you get out of my life
And let me make a new start?

[Pre-Chorus]
Lettin' me get over you
The way you've gotten over me, hey
[Chorus]
Set me free, why don't cha, babe?
Let me be, why don't cha, babe? (Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh)
'Cause you don't really love me
You just keep me hangin' on (Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh)
Now, you don't really want me
You just keep me hangin' on

[Verse 2]
You say, although we broke up
You still wanna be just friends
But how can we still be friends
When seein' you only breaks my heart again?

[Pre-Chorus (Spoken)]
And there ain't nothin' I can do about it

[Chorus]
(Whoa, whoa, whoa) Set me free, why don't cha babe?
(Whoa, whoa, whoa) Get out my life, why don't cha babe? (Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh) Set me free, why don't cha babe?
Get out my life, why don't cha babe?

[Verse 3]
You claim you still care for me
But your heart and soul needs to be free
And now that you've got your freedom
You wanna still hold on to me
[Pre-Chorus]
You don't want me for yourself
So let me find somebody else, hey-ey

[Chorus]
Why don't you be a man about it
And set me free? (Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh)
Now, you don't care a thing about me
You're just usin' me (Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh)
Go on, get out, get out of my life
And let me sleep at night, please (Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh)
'Cause you don't really love me
You just keep me hangin' onEmbed
